Application.Controller

Class UserInfoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Controller.UserInfoController

  • @Controller
public class UserInfoController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for managing User information. When using COCTEAU Users are asked to provide some data. This step is asked only once and it is mandatory (for now) for research purposes. The data collected is
    • Nationality
    • Country (if EU)
    • Region (if Non-EU)
    • Age
    • Gender
    • Education
    • Interest in sharing their opinions
    • Email address
    Among these, the email is the only field that is not mandatory.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Detail

      • loadPage

        @RequestMapping(value="/userinfo",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String loadPage(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="lang",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                java.lang.String lang,
                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="lang",required=false)
                                                                                                java.lang.String language)
        Returns the page through which Users share their data.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - cookie of the Administrator creating of the new Vision.
        lang - String, language code passed as query-string parameter.
        language - String, language code from locale cookie.
        Returns:
        "userinfo" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • saveInfo

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveInfo",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String saveInfo(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                 @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="nationality")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String nationality,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="country")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String country,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="region")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String region,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="age")
                                                                                                 int age,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="gender")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String gender,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="education")
                                                                                                 int education,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="interest")
                                                                                                 int interest,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="mail")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String mail,
                                                                                                 @CookieValue(value="cookieconsent_status",defaultValue="allow")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String cookieConsent,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="lang",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                 java.lang.String lang)
        Updates a User information present on the database.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        user_id - cookie of the Administrator creating of the new Vision.
        nationality - String, either "EU" or "Non-EU".
        country - String, country code for European countries.
        region - String, code for the continent for people outside EU.
        age - Integer, age range a User belongs to.
        • 1: Under 20
        • 2: 21 - 30
        • 3: 31 - 40
        • 4: 41 - 50
        • 5: 51 - 60
        • 6: 61 - 70
        • 7: 71 - 80
        • 8: Over 80
        • 9: Prefer not to say
        gender - String, gender of a User.
        • M: Male
        • F: Female
        • N: Prefer not to say
        education - Integer, the education level of a User.
        • 1: Less then high school
        • 2: High school diploma
        • 3: Bachelor Degree
        • 4: Master Degree
        • 5: PhD
        • 6: Prefer not to say
        interest - Integer, the degree of interest a User has in sharing their opinion.
        • 1: No interest
        • 2: Low interest
        • 3: Medium interest
        • 4: High interest
        • 5: Great interest
        • 6: Prefer not to say
        mail - String, the email of a User. Not mandatory.
        cookieConsent - String, "accept" or "deny", represent whether or not a User has expressed consent for cookies.
        lang - String, language code passed as query-string parameter.
        Returns:
        "redirect:/scenario" string redirecting to the specified Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.
